org.eclipse.eef.common.ui.api

Class EEFWidgetFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.FormToolkit
      • org.eclipse.eef.common.ui.api.EEFWidgetFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EEFLegacyTabbedPropertySheetWidgetFactory

    public class EEFWidgetFactory
extends org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.FormToolkit
    A FormToolkit customized for use by tabbed property sheet page and others.
    Since:
    1.6.0
